tool_description: Analyzes project specifications to determine optimal fiber and yarn requirements based on garment type, intended use, and user preferences.

project_type.description: Type of textile project (e.g., sweater, scarf, blanket, socks, hat, bag)

intended_use.description: How the item will be used (e.g., everyday wear, formal wear, outdoor activities, home decor, baby items)

target_recipient.description: Who will use the item (e.g., adult, child, baby, elderly)

size_category.description: Size range for the project (e.g., XS, S, M, L, XL, XXL, custom)

skill_level.description: Crafter's experience level (beginner, intermediate, advanced, expert)

budget_range.description: Budget category for materials (low, medium, high, luxury)

timeline_weeks.description: Available time to complete project in weeks (1-52)

care_preferences.description: Preferred care method (machine wash, hand wash, dry clean only, minimal care)

error_messages: Invalid project type: Project type must be a recognized textile item. Common types include sweater, scarf, blanket, socks, hat, mittens, bag, pillow.
Unrecognized intended use: Specify a clear use case such as everyday wear, formal wear, outdoor activities, sports, home decor, or baby items.
Invalid target recipient: Recipient must be specified as adult, child, baby, toddler, teen, or elderly.
Unsupported size category: Use standard sizing (XS, S, M, L, XL, XXL) or specify 'custom' for non-standard sizes.
Invalid skill level: Skill level must be one of: beginner, intermediate, advanced, or expert.
Timeline out of range: Project timeline must be between 1 and 52 weeks.
Invalid budget range: Budget must be one of: low, medium, high, or luxury.
usage: Provide project_type, intended_use, target_recipient, size_category, and skill_level as minimum requirements. Add optional parameters for more precise recommendations. The tool will analyze requirements and suggest fiber characteristics needed for project success.

recommended_fiber_properties.description: List of essential fiber characteristics for this project

yarn_weight_suggestion.description: Recommended yarn weight category (lace, sport, DK, worsted, chunky, etc.)

durability_importance.description: How critical durability is for this project (low, medium, high, critical)

care_requirements.description: Required care characteristics based on use and recipient

estimated_complexity.description: Project complexity assessment (simple, moderate, complex, advanced)

seasonal_considerations.description: Temperature and weather considerations for the project
